caption.p: Mobile fractions of the different PEG-rhodamine probes measured in untreated and pretreated samples enzymatically hydrolysed for 0 h, 15 h and 96 h. Error bars represent the standard deviations of the mobile fraction calculated from the averaged recovery curve. Asterisks indicate statistically significant difference between the MF of a probe at a considered saccharification time point with its MF at 0 h. UNT untreated, HW hot water, IL ionic liquid
